content.div:
We've barely had time to accept/mourn the fact that Canadian hunk Ryan Gosling is dating Eva Mendes, but now there’s rumours that our pretend boyfriend is back on the market.

A couple of UK tabloids are reporting the easy-on-the-eyes couple is taking a break after six months of dating. According to The Mirror, Gosling has been telling friends that he needs some space and "time to think."

Another source told the Daily Mail, "Ryan and Eva are having trouble seeing eye to eye." (Maybe they mean it in the literal sense? The actor is a 6’1” package of dreaminess, while Mendes is only 5’6”.)

The paper claimed the 31-year-old actor jetted off to South Africa, where was supposedly spotted in Cape Town with a blonde mystery woman.

But don't launch into your letter-writing campaign to woo the reportedly single actor just yet. A source close to Gosling and Mendes tells Us Weekly that they are doing just fine, while Lainey Gossip reports that Gosling is still in Thailand shooting Only God Forgives, and Mendes was photographed there with him last Thursday.

Mendes' publicist has denied rumours that the couple is going through a rocky patch, reports Us Weekly.

Mendes, 38, previously told Marie Claire of her costar-turned-boyfriend, “He's your dream co-star. I have never felt so creatively satisfied on a film. He's amazing."

entry.title: George Clooney Plans Career-Ending Prank for Brad Pitt

link.Abstract: George Clooney says that he's planning to sabotage Brad Pitt's career with a practical joke.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: "I have done some horrible things to people. Truly, truly horrible," Clooney said on the season premiere of Inside the Actors Studio, (which airs on Jan. 31, 7 p.m. ET). "I'm working on one right now for Brad Pitt. It might end his career."
